author: William Worrall
title: Coronavirus Exposes Wetherspoons CEO’s True Scumbag Colors
description: During the coronavirus pandemic, CEOs like Wetherspoons boss Tim Martin are showing their true colors and need to be exiled to the gulag when this is all over. The post Coronavirus Exposes Wetherspoons CEO’s True Scumbag Colors appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Tim Martin, the founder of the U.K. pub chain Wetherspoons, is no stranger to controversy
